name: Baldi's Terrific New Game DEMO!
description:
Oh Noes! You left ALL 7 of your noteboos at school.. and one teacher is there.. Mr. Baldi.... Retrive all seven notebooks and avoid contact with him or he will spank you!

This game is in development, That means everything seen here is subject to change. The game is not done and will be updated soon!

All credit to mystyman12 for the godly game

If you don't want to download, I have a scratch version. Just type SannesTheBoss or Baldi's Terrific New Game DEMO! and it should be there

A NEW DEMO IS HERE! CHECK IT OUT!

Baldi's Terrific New Game PLUS!
